class.name: Cripter
class.description: This module allows you to easily encrypt and decrypt data.

method.name: cbc_decrypt
method.description: Decrypt data using CBC algorithm. Returns a new [PackedByteArray] with the data decrypted. The Password used to decrypt the data must be the same as the one used to encrypt.

method.name: cbc_encrypt
method.description: Encrypt data using CBC algorithm. Returns a new [PackedByteArray] with the data encrypted.

method.name: gcm_decrypt
method.description: Decrypt data using GCM algorithm. Returns a new [PackedByteArray] with the data decrypted. The password used to decrypt the data must be the same as the one used to encrypt. An additional string can be used to encrypt data.

method.name: gcm_encrypt
method.description: Decrypt data using GCM algorithm. Returns a new [PackedByteArray] with the data encrypted. An additional string can be used to encrypt data.

method.name: keys_match_check
method.description: Check if public and private keys are relative to each other.

method.name: rsa_decrypt
method.description: Decrypt data using RSA algorithm. Returns a new [PackedByteArray] with the data decrypted. An SSH key pair is required to perform encryption and decryption using this algorithm. If you are using a encrypted private key the password will be required.

method.name: rsa_encrypt
method.description: Decrypt data using RSA algorithm. Returns a new [PackedByteArray] with the data encrypted. An SSH key pair is required to perform encryption and decryption using this algorithm.
